metadata.name: New or Renamed User Account with '$' Character
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a user with the "$" character. This can be used by attackers to hide a user or trick detection systems that lack the parsing mechanisms.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (metadata.event_code = 4720 AND contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('$')) OR metadata.event_code = 4781 AND contains(lower(user_result.name), lower('$'))) AND NOT (metadata.event_code = 4720 AND lower(user_result.name) = lower('homegroupuser$')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a user with the "$" character. This can be used by attackers to hide a user or trick detection systems that lack the parsing mechanisms.
